text: Jerome Teasley (August 13, 1948 - June 16, 2016) was an American Soul Drummer. He was a member of the Motown Hall of Fame. He has toured with Junior Walker and the All Stars,Junior Walker And The All Stars Page and has also worked with Al Green, Jimi Hendrix, Wilson Pickett, Tina Turner, Bill Carr and Jazz saxophonist Sonny Stitt among many others. Teasley died on June 16, 2016 in a hospital in Phoenix, Arizona from complications of lung and liver cancer, aged 67.Jerome Teasley, drummer for Motown, R&B; legends, dies in Phoenix at 67 ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:American drummers Category:American soul musicians Category:Musicians from Detroit
title: Jerome Teasley
